mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.D_NAME, A.D_NO FROM DEPT A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.D_NO = B.D_NO WHERE 1=1 AND B.C_NO = #{cNo} ORDER BY D_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SURVEY_BOARD A JOIN SB_TARGET_DEPT B ON A.SB_NO = B.SB_NO WHERE 1=1 AND B.SB_TD_NO IN (#{dNo} , 0) AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} AND TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > SYSDATE

SELECT A.* , C.M_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERNAME", D.D_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERDNAME",
CASE WHEN (A.SB_NO, #{mNo}) NOT IN (SELECT * FROM SB_ANSWER WHERE M_NO = #{mNo})THEN '미참여' WHEN (A.SB_NO, #{mNo}) IN (SELECT * FROM SB_ANSWER WHERE M_NO = #{mNo}) THEN '참여 완료' END AS "SB_ASTATE"
FROM SURVEY_BOARD A JOIN SB_TARGET_DEPT B ON A.SB_NO = B.SB_NO JOIN MEMBER C ON A.SB_FOUNDERNO = C.M_NO JOIN DEPT D ON C.D_NO = D.D_NO WHERE 1=1 AND B.SB_TD_NO IN (#{dNo}, 0) AND A.C_NO = #{cNo}
AND TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > SYSDATE-1
ORDER BY A.SB_STARTDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SURVEY_BOARD WHERE C_NO = #{cNo}

SELECT DISTINCT A.*, C.M_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERNAME", D.D_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERDNAME", CASE WHEN (A.SB_NO, #{mNo}) NOT IN (SELECT * FROM SB_ANSWER WHERE M_NO = #{mNo}) AND TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > SYSDATE THEN '미참여' WHEN (A.SB_NO, #{mNo}) IN (SELECT SB_NO , M_NO FROM SB_ANSWER WHERE M_NO = #{mNo}) AND TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > SYSDATE-1 THEN '참여 완료'
WHEN TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < SYSDATE-1 THEN '종료됨'
END AS "SB_ASTATE" FROM SURVEY_BOARD A JOIN SB_TARGET_DEPT B ON A.SB_NO = B.SB_NO JOIN MEMBER C ON A.SB_FOUNDERNO = C.M_NO JOIN DEPT D ON C.D_NO = D.D_NO WHERE A.C_NO = #{cNo} ORDER BY A.SB_STARTDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SURVEY_BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND C_NO = #{cNo} AND SB_NO IN (SELECT SB_NO FROM SURVEY_BOARD B WHERE SB_FOUNDERNO = #{mNo})

SELECT DISTINCT A.*, C.M_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERNAME", D.D_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERDNAME", CASE WHEN (A.SB_NO, #{mNo}) NOT IN (SELECT * FROM SB_ANSWER WHERE M_NO = #{mNo}) AND TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > SYSDATE THEN '미참여' WHEN (A.SB_NO, #{mNo}) IN (SELECT * FROM SB_ANSWER WHERE M_NO = #{mNo}) AND TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > SYSDATE-1 THEN '참여 완료'
WHEN TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < SYSDATE-1 THEN '종료됨'
END AS "SB_ASTATE" FROM SURVEY_BOARD A JOIN SB_TARGET_DEPT B ON A.SB_NO = B.SB_NO JOIN MEMBER C ON A.SB_FOUNDERNO = C.M_NO JOIN DEPT D ON C.D_NO = D.D_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} AND A.SB_NO IN (SELECT SB_NO FROM SURVEY_BOARD B WHERE B.SB_FOUNDERNO = #{mNo}) ORDER BY A.SB_STARTDATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SURVEY_BOARD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.C_NO = #{cNo}
AND TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < SYSDATE-1

SELECT DISTINCT A.*, C.M_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERNAME", D.D_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERDNAME", CASE
WHEN TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < SYSDATE-1 THEN '종료됨'
END AS "SB_ASTATE" FROM SURVEY_BOARD A JOIN SB_TARGET_DEPT B ON A.SB_NO = B.SB_NO JOIN MEMBER C ON A.SB_FOUNDERNO = C.M_NO JOIN DEPT D ON C.D_NO = D.D_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.C_NO = #{cNo}
AND TO_DATE(A.SB_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < SYSDATE-1
ORDER BY A.SB_STARTDATE DESC

SELECT A.*, B.SB_I_NO, B.SB_I_TITLE, B.SB_I_TYPE, C.SQ_NO, C.SQ_CONTENT, D.M_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERNAME", E.D_NAME AS "SB_FOUNDERDNAME" FROM SURVEY_BOARD A JOIN SB_INQUIRY B ON A.SB_NO = B.SB_NO JOIN SB_QUESTION C ON B.SB_I_NO = C.SB_I_NO JOIN MEMBER D ON A.SB_FOUNDERNO = D.M_NO JOIN DEPT E ON E.D_NO = D.D_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.SB_NO = #{sbNo} AND A.C_NO = #{cNo}
